    • Constructor Detail

      • KFClusterWatcher

        public KFClusterWatcher(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> configuration,
                        KFMonitorCallback kfMonitorListener)
        Constructs a Kafka watcher instance that monitors Kafka cluster and notify clients when broker status has changed

        Parameters:
        configuration - Map containing configuration properties. PropertyNames.KF_SERVERS and PropertyNames.KF_SERVERS properties are mandatory.
        kfMonitorListener - KFMonitorCallback instance implemented by client that wants to be notified when kafka broker status has changed
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when any argument is null or required configuration is missing

      • KFClusterWatcher

        public KFClusterWatcher(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> configuration)
        Creates a Kafka watcher instance that monitors Kafka cluster.

        Parameters:
        configuration - Configuration properties.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when any argument is null or required configuration is missing
        See Also:
        for more details

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        It starts Kafka cluster watcher.

        This method should be called after creating a KFClusterWatcher instance and before calling any other method. Calling this method more than once does not have effect.

        Throws:
        com.mcafee.dxl.streaming.operations.client.exception.ConnectionException - if zookeeper connection fails

      • stop

        public void stop()
        It stops kafka cluster monitoring.

        Once this method has been called, others methods will not work. Calling this method more than once does not have effect.

      • getCluster

        public KFCluster getCluster()
        It returns a KFCluster instance that contains the current kafka cluster status and list of brokers.
        Returns:
        KFCluster instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if start() method was not called.

      • getHealth

        public KFClusterStatusName getHealth()
        Returns:
        KFClusterStatusName enum that represents the kafka cluster status

      • process

        public void process(org.apache.zookeeper.WatchedEvent event)
        It listen to Zookeeper events. It is called automatically by Zookeeper when a Kafka broker znode has appeared/disappeared or session connect/disconnect
        Specified by:
        process in interface org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher
        Parameters:
        event - WatchedEvent instance sent by Zookeeper node
